infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: This app needs access to your health data to track your fitness and nutrition goals.
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: This app needs permission to update your health data with tracked meals and activities.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app needs access to your calendar to schedule workouts and meals around your existing events.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: This app needs access to your reminders to help you stay on track with your health goals.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app needs camera access to take photos of your meals for AI nutrition analysis.
infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app needs microphone access to record voice descriptions of your meals.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app needs photo library access to select meal photos for AI nutrition analysis.
infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app needs your location to provide weather information and local dining recommendations.

plugins.healthSharePermission: This app needs access to your health data to track your fitness and nutrition goals.
plugins.healthUpdatePermission: This app needs permission to update your health data with tracked meals and activities.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow Heirclark to access your camera to take photos of meals for AI nutrition analysis and scan barcodes.
plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Heirclark to access your microphone to record voice meal descriptions.

plugins.locationWhenInUsePermission: Allow Heirclark to use your location to provide weather information and local dining recommendations.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow Heirclark to access your photo library to select meal photos for AI nutrition analysis.

plugins.microphonePermission: Allow Heirclark to access your microphone to record voice meal descriptions.

plugins.calendarPermission: This app needs access to your calendar to schedule workouts and meals around your existing events.
plugins.remindersPermission: This app needs access to your reminders to help you stay on track with your health goals.
